product_name: Horny Toad Supersly Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Delivering good looks without the hassle of worrying about wrinkles, the men's Horny Toad Supersly shirt maintains easygoing style for any casual setting. Horny Toad made the men's Supersly shirt with a finely woven blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester won't wilt in the heat or wrinkle in the wash. Full-front button placket; button-through double patch chest pocket; shirttail hem. Closeout.
short_description: Delivering good looks without the hassle of worrying about wrinkles, the men's Horny Toad Supersly shirt maintains easygoing style for any casual setting.
